import React, { Component } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import item1 from "../img/item1.jpg"; class DisplayItems extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { providerkitchen: "", foods: "" }; } componentWillMount() { axios .get( "http://localhost:3001/user/getuniquekitchen/" + this.props.match.params.id, { headers: { auth_token: localStorage.getItem("auth_token") } } ) .then(data => { console.log(data.data); this.setState({ providerkitchen: data.data }); }) .catch(err => { if (err) console.log(err); }); axios .get( "http://localhost:3001/user/getfooditems/" + this.props.match.params.id, { headers: { auth_token: localStorage.getItem("auth_token") } } ) .then(data => { console.log(data.data); this.setState({ foods: data.data }); }) .catch(err => { if (err) console.log(err); }); } render() { return (

{this.state.providerkitchen.kitchen_name}

); } } const mapStateToProps = state => { const { isLoggedIn, kitchens } = state; return { isLoggedIn, kitchens }; }; export default connect(mapStateToProps)(DisplayItems);
